newsitem.title: UK: NatWest Securities hires three from SBC Warburg.
newsitem.headline: NatWest Securities hires three from SBC Warburg.

text.p: NatWest Securities said on Thursday it had hired a team of three specialist equity salesmen from rival investment bank SBC Warburg to cover UK and European equity sales to Scandinavian investors.
The recruitment of Patrick Rarden, Mogens Rye and Peter Kysela move comes after NatWest hired Michael Mortensen from Paine Webber to cover sales of U.S. equities to Scandinavian institutions.
"We are delighted to welcome such a high calibre team of sales professionals," said NatWest head of UK and European institutional sales Nick Bowers.
